column2: Kuldeep S. Meel@National University of Singapore

column1: AAAI Technical Track: Reasoning under Uncertainty
Recent years have seen an unprecedented adoption of artificial intelligence in a wide variety of applications ranging from medical diagnosis
column3: security to aircraft collision avoidance. Probabilistic reasoning is a key component of such modern artificial intelligence systems. Sampling techniques form the core of the state of the art probabilistic reasoning systems.
